participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is nurturing, patient, and enjoys engaging with children. She has a passion for teaching and a love for music.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i love to play board games. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous, optimistic, and values his independence. He enjoys spending time with friends and is determined to carve out his own path.
participant_2.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i don't drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i work took i've a part time job at burger king.
